role.argrole: thing tried on (experiencer: ARG0 tried ARG1 on ARG2)

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P جربنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-TMP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN مدى) (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN نصف) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN قرن))))) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC كل) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الانواع))))))
